website_summaries.verdict: A nice set of animal puppets with the quality you can rely on from Melissa & Doug, and a good value on price.
pros: Kids enjoy this friendly looking animal puppet set
A nice size that adults can get their hands into
Melissa & Doug makes several versions of his set, including farm animals and a variety of people sets
cons: The mouths on these puppets are not large and "talkable

customer_reviews.title: Mouth does not open. Still works though 😊
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids love puppets. Decided to try this for my 16 month old son. Love the details of the puppet, front and back. Only thing i wish is mouth of puppet can open! Unfortunately not!! Price is affordable. Overall, im still happy with the purchase. Hope this video helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jonix

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: As many have noted, these are practically too small for an adult to use, yet too large for a young toddler (2.5) to get their fingers into the required positions for the head and arms. Was hoping for fun play and interaction, but with the limitations, we can't really put them to much use. The quality is mediocre, especially for a M&D product, and the packaging ties left large, permanent holes in all the animal bodies in front and back. You can't open the mouths to make them talk, so you can only move their heads and arms around. When compared to a decent quality puppet that more resembles a furry stuffed animal, these are just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: dojoklo

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Well Made and Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set along with the Farm Friends set for my daughter for play time and story time. She loves them. She likes to cover both her hands with an animal puppet and run around the house making noises associated to the animal. For the Tiger she likes to go "meow meow" and makes it dance. These puppets are big enough to support most adult hand sizes, which makes it handy for story time and bed time readings. Like most Melissa and Doug items, the quality is really good and well made. If you want to wash these, I recommend gentle cycle in cool water and air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs2Cook

customer_reviews.title: Bought every set!
customer_reviews.text: These are very colorful and soft. My large adult teacher hand fits, and so does my 10 year olds! We had a blast playing with them! I ordered all of the sets. The only flaw is that the plastic tags holding the puppets into the packaging made a holes and snags in the fabric that are permanent. Otherwise great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: To my disappointment, I could barely get my hand into the ...
customer_reviews.text: These puppets came today and I was excited to use them to entertain my 1 year old granddaughter. To my disappointment, I could barely get my hand into the puppet (I have avg. size hands at best). I could not keep them in the puppet comfortably for any length of time. Even though the ad says they fit most adult hands, I tend to disagree. I also disagree with the 2 people who said an adult could wear them. Utterly disappointed since I loved puppets as a kid and was so looking forward to them. Even though they are cute to look at, puppets need to be functional!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Fun puppets for storytime, pre-reading skills for baby.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable way to teach story grammar in a fun way: beginning, middle, end of a story. Puppet can "read" a story in his voice to baby as mom's other hand holds the book. Lots of fun to teach baby the animal's sounds. Monkey coordinates with Curious George series, elephant with Babar, tiger with Tigger in Pooh series. Powered only by baby's and mom's imagination! Not infant safe since they have sewn on eyes, but great with supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn King Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made animals but it's OK for small children I suppose
customer_reviews.text: Puppets are very small and made for kids hands to go in. If you're a grown man or a regular sized woman this probably won't work for you. The material is very thin and cheaply made. I guess what can one expect with the low price. My child is interested in it at least and smiles when he sees the animals, he is 20 months old. Good for basic entertainment but poorly made animals
customer_reviews.author: A fabulous shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: they are small & feel like they are super cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: NOT worth $20. Just not. Not worth $1 for the set. My son is turning 6, and has begged for some hand puppets. I was excited to find these online, but I have to be honest, they are small & feel like they are super cheaply made. I wasn't expecting Gund quality, but the quality of these puppets was certainly not worth $20. If I was looking at these in the store, I would not have paid more than $5 for the set. Oh well, I hope my son likes them. I bet they will be torn up in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: April Keith

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the puppets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these so my other children can play with the newborn without touching her and these will work great. The kids already like playing with them and I can't wait to see how the next one enjoys her puppet shows! They even have little tails painted on the back of them. The puppets are large enough for my hands too. Looking forward to using them!
customer_reviews.author: josh w

customer_reviews.title: Mouths don’t open
customer_reviews.text: What kind of hand puppet doesn’t move it’s mouth???? I bought my granddaughter a BIG giraffe by this same company and she loves it so when I saw these hand puppets, I thought, “Oh yeah.” BIG disappointment.....I used to use hand puppets in my job so boy was I dissatisfied when these had no mouth movement. I think I might just give them away.....very dissatisfied.☹️
customer_reviews.author: Spartan

customer_reviews.title: I love Melissa & Doug typically
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa & Doug typically. If the child is using these they are fine. If I want to use them to play with my kids though, the finger holes are super small. They are 100% made for child hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Pyle

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute set and a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set and a great value for the price. We bought these for my youngest child at 10 months and he is still enjoying them at 14 months. They are nice and small and I often have one in my diaper bag. They are a little small for my hands though, and probably will work better for a child to do puppet shows than to use with a parent. The mouths don't open, but my baby still likes to try to feed them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and LarissaTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: This is really upsetting as I so love the actual puppets and like I said are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these this morning and they are indeed well made (myself being a seamstress can attest to that). Unfortunately, they state on the package that they can fit children and adults is just not true! They are wide enough for my hands but not even close to being able to extend my fingers inside. Within seconds my fingers were cramped. This is really upsetting as I so love the actual puppets and like I said are very well made. On their quality alone, I would give even more than a 5 star, but the fit just doesn't work... I will sadly have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: ensign4Him

customer_reviews.title: Too Small and poor materials
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike these, can't understand the high rating. The entry is really small so as an adult is impossible to use. The materials are poor and cheap. I purchase these to entertain and create stories for my baby. 1 week later they are in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Joaofer

customer_reviews.title: My kid LOVES them...but you may find a few flaws.
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVES these...we already had the farm animal set. My only complaint would be quality control. The giraffe always inverts on the inside so it's difficult to get your fingers up into the puppet. I had an issue with one of the puppets from a different set that the seam wasn't sewn properly so your fingers went straight through it into the cotton in the puppet's head. That being said I would TOTALLY buy these again because my 1 1/2 year old plays with them EVERY day. My kid LOVES them!!! Great teaching tool.
customer_reviews.author: NEMommy

customer_reviews.title: FOR SOMEONE WITH SMALLER HANDS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these puppets to interact with my son. This issue is the small size. I can use it ok with some restrictions but for my husband, DON'T EVEN QUESTION THAT! He cannot play with that for our son. Would be perfect for kiddo's hands during playtime. Gave it 4 stars because of the size and inability to move the puppet's mouth during playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected and missed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my hands (Male with extra-large glove size), so they were disappointing. At least the baby can wear them, but so far (16 months old), there is no real interest, perhaps because I cannot demonstrate them properly. Inexpensive, but also an ignored toy, so I would not purchase them again. I was hoping to use them to entertain the baby and they did not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful made but not for adult hands
customer_reviews.text: The puppets are well done and look beautiful HOWEVER I’m giving them 2 stars because they DO NOTFIT ADULT HANDS! I’m small female with small hands and although I can get my hand inside, the space is so restricted and I’m unable to actually use them. I was so excited when then arrived and so disappointed that I can’t use them. My husband’s couldn’t even get his fingers inside!
customer_reviews.author: BellaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Images don't do these little fellas justice
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are so much better than shown in the image - what a great surprise. The quality of the material and construction is a revelation at this price, and the faces are too cute. I'll definitely buy more sets. Melissa and Dough offerings just keep getting better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeyar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my zoo puppets! The are perfect for teaching online! They fit my adult size woman hands and I can move the puppet’s arms and head with no problems. They’re easy to take on and off during class too! I love the detail on the animals, they’re well made and so soft. Perfect price too!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but too expensive in my opinion and I don’t like that the mouth doesn’t open, the head just moves. I was looking for something a little different, these are also difficult for me to use, I am 5ft 9 and my hands are not super tiny so there wasn’t a lot of room for me to maneuver them. I am giving three stars because my kids didn’t really notice all of this lol.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not made for human hands
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are adorable and my son loves them. But they're designed very poorly. The spaces made available for puppeting are short and too close together. It hurts my hand to try and play with them for my son. Wish I had bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Good price on these, and I love that I can pack them up into the diaper bag to carry along. They don't take up much space. They are well made, and they should last a long time. Perfect for child or adult use. Adults with large fingers may have a bit of trouble making these fit, but for most women, they should fit well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Red Teapot

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved them. They are a little small for adult ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved them. They are a little small for adult hands, but mine do fit in their though I do not have a very large hand. We had a tradition of reading stories at night and talking through our day with puppets with our son and he can now continue the tradition. They are of good quality as one expects from Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Cellolady

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my 4 year old niece. I really like these and plan to buy others like them. The size is perfect for her. The are soft and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: AnnD

customer_reviews.title: Great puppet, little space for fingers
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the puppets, very well made, and my baby is delighted to play with the toys. However, when it is put on the hand as a puppet, the space for fingers is so small, its so hard to make a puppet move, and impossible to make it clap its claws.. I wish the claws were a little bigger..
customer_reviews.author: Upsi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for fun play
customer_reviews.text: My 1 yr. granddaughter LOVES these! They are well made, really soft and easy for her to carry around. She puts them to her face to feel the softness. Highly recommended. Love that they can be thrown in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: B. Milberry

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, and very soft. Unfortunately, they're constructed so there isn't a deep enough interior pocket for even the smallest of hands to move the the arms or head much. Probably best for young children (3 and under), with limited manual dexterity
customer_reviews.author: Selah Campillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 4-5 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for little hands. The characters are engaging for the age range. Enjoying daily puppet shows
customer_reviews.author: R. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it simple and enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter and grandsons are enjoying pretend play with these puppets. As a former early intervention teacher, I think the bright colors and simplicity of these hand puppets are a “win” for developmental ages of eighteen months to three years. They are affordable and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. I use them when teaching online video classes with younger kids. They are small for my hands but I can make them work. They look good on video screen and the kids love the happy expressions. I would buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s my fault for not checking the description more closely but the mouths aren’t movable which is what I was looking for. I bought them for my 11 month old and I would say they’re just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sleighter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I loved these small animal puppets. I separated them to give as individual gifts. All the recipients loved them! Their parents thought they were fun and durable gifts for their 2 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: mary clement

customer_reviews.title: Cute but mouths don’t move
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little puppets but I would have liked to see in the product description that the mouth did or did not move. According to to product description I could use these for phonics. Well actually I cannot because the mouth does not move. I prefer puppets where I can manipulate the mouth so children can see and imitate sounds.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These wonderful hand puppets are well made. For the price, you cannot beat them. We purchased a puppet theatre and the puppets for a Christmas present and the young children went wild having plays! Sometimes the "good old toys" are the best. Imagination stimulation! Thank you for a terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: Judith B.

customer_reviews.title: They are a big small for adult hands but would be great for children (or adults with small hands)
customer_reviews.text: Cute puppets. They are a big small for adult hands but would be great for children (or adults with small hands). The inside of the tiger was not properly stitched and leaked stuffing during the wash. Otherwise, they survived the machine wash and dryer fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderpig

customer_reviews.title: Puppets
customer_reviews.text: The products are well made. I just expected a the mouths of the puppets to move. These do not.
customer_reviews.author: Compassion

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to warm up to
customer_reviews.text: Plush soft cute hand puppets. Always have loved M & D quality childrens products. I may have liked these, no, i did like these far more than my kid at first. I love M & D toys. Great feel has also been quite durable
customer_reviews.author: Cee DeLoy

customer_reviews.title: Stubby arms, can’t move mouth
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a deal of the day and was so excited about the low price I didn’t stop to really look closely at the item first. My bad. These puppets are not usable. The arms are so stubby you can’t really do anything with them. And you can’t move the mouths. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Young

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These puppets seem well-made and are cute, but they are definitely a bit smaller than I expected. They're rather difficult to fit an adult's hand into them. Oh well, the kids can't really tell that you're struggling and they still smile!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Paw

customer_reviews.title: Love Melissa and Doug products!
customer_reviews.text: These are still packaged as they are gifts. I am very happy with the designs and the grandkids will have many hours of imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought thaws to use as an educational tool. They are good quality and durable
customer_reviews.author: sallee decker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Misleading advertisement,not child safe.not able to be used by kid and adult. Very little hands only. The mouse that came had Bead eyes that could be pulled off and swallowed by small children. You only get one and no choice of which.
customer_reviews.author: Q.Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality! Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Got these for my little Yorkie dog I put them on my hand and she goes nuts! They hold up very well! Very durable
customer_reviews.author: MARYJANE

customer_reviews.title: Damaged material
customer_reviews.text: I usually have had very good luck with Melissa and Doug products. I recently purchased these cute puppets for my grandson's birthday, but when the pack was opened for the first time, one of the puppets (the monkey) had a big hole in the front of the puppet. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My grandbabies love interacting with them
customer_reviews.text: My grandbabies love these. They get giddy when we use them. They are kind of small they dont reach my wrist and I have small hands but will be good for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: portalatin rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Puppets are lots of fun, 2 year old enjoys both playing and cuddling ...
customer_reviews.text: Puppets are lots of fun, 2 year old enjoys both playing and cuddling with them. But do note that the puppets do not fit adult hands well at all. The angles for the arms are much too acute to be at all ergonomic. Otherwise, they've been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: We thought he would love these puppets
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old loves animals. We thought he would love these puppets. They mostly unused in his toy box as compared to the finger puppets we randomly found at the mall. These puppets are too small for adults to use. The quality is not what I expected from Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Chuk

customer_reviews.title: Too small for adult hand
customer_reviews.text: Adorable puppets but what I disliked was the tiny space allowed for the hands. Does not work well for adult fingers. I had a Steiff tiger puppet and it worked great. These puppets lack the ability for a grandmother to entertain her granddaughter because of the little arms on the puppets.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhound Lover STF

customer_reviews.title: Fine puppets, mouths don't open.
customer_reviews.text: These are fine starter puppets. I wish their mouths opened but as long as you don't need that feature these puppets are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Adorable puppets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my baby girl, and they are so very cute! Melissa and Doug products are pretty high-quality, and I predict I will be able to use these puppets for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and have a fun time doing puppet shoes for a 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna

customer_reviews.title: Autistic Child
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my neighbors son who has Autism. He's just a little guy. I bought them for their different texture's and to put in his busy hands. Naturally he loses interest quickly, but he did show interstate in them.
customer_reviews.author: supersuz

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the niece (4 years) went nuts for them. Great colors, textures, and variety in animals. Easy and simple for children to use.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Puppet Theater
customer_reviews.text: Best puppet theaters ever - when the grandchildren come over.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A little snug for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and soft but they are a little small for an adult. I’m a 5 foot 5 inches tall woman with fairly small hands and they are a little snug for me. Very happy overall but just be aware that they are not going to be roomy for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Better quality control would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.text: The item is good. However, while opening and giving it to my niece, I found one of the toys was damaged with a large cut. I would have normally returned it for an exchange but that was not practical given that I had already given couple of toys to a kid to play with. So I gave her three in good shape and just hid the fourth torn one so as not to disappoint her.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute, and fun for baby!
customer_reviews.text: The baby LOVES these. He loves to snuggle with them when he’s going to sleep and gets so excited to see “his guys” during the day. Very cute and have held up to multiple washings in the washing machine too.
customer_reviews.author: Kata Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: too small for adult hands
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to play with my kids with these, but they are too small for adult hands. I am 5'6" and it was small for me. my kids held it a bit, but was over it.
customer_reviews.author: K31hero14

customer_reviews.title: Okay, poor seams on the puppets
customer_reviews.text: Like: my child enjoys the soft material of them. Usable as a stuffed animal as well for a one year old. Dislikes: unfortunately the side seams on a few of the puppets began to unravel a few days after use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evalt

customer_reviews.title: My 1 year old lives them!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! They're a little on the small size (my husband can't fit his hand in there) but they are a big hit for my baby girl. She loves to play peek-a-boo with them. The only thing that was holding me back from a 5 star review is the price- they should be at least a few dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mamadukes

customer_reviews.title: They are fun to play with your baby
customer_reviews.text: I use a white boand and play with these puppets above the board. It intrigued a 9 month old, really and really amused a 3 year old . They are fun to play with your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nandini

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft and well made. It is difficult, as other posters stated to use it properly: 1) There is no room in the heads to be able to get a finger or two in to move it properly 2) the arms need to be a little longer. They are certainly a good value for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Manville

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gift
customer_reviews.text: Sweet gift for my 3 year great granddaughter. She loves playing with them in the car and they keep her occupied at church.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Small enough for toddler hands
customer_reviews.text: Puppets are small enough for toddler hands. Super soft fabric
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: i bought these as a gift for my 2 1/2 year old and they are perfect. She snuggles them at night and plays with them during the day. They are perfect size for little kid hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought the puppets for a grandchild
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised at the quality of these puppets.They fit my granddaughter's hands and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Best entertaining toys for my 20 month old toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old toddler wears them and talk with them and keeps all of us amused and entertained :)
customer_reviews.author: Rez

customer_reviews.title: I use them to teach 3-5 year olds and they love it! My own twins love to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: They are kids size but they do fit adults. I use them to teach 3-5 year olds and they love it! My own twins love to play with them and it truly allows children to communicate more with others :).
customer_reviews.author: Sexygirl

customer_reviews.title: Sweet puppets
customer_reviews.text: Darling puppets! Wish they were slightly larger for adults, but are perfect for children.
customer_reviews.author: dslota

customer_reviews.title: Such cute puppets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 1/2 year old nephew for Christmas. He loved them. Melissa & Doug make such great, durable, simple toys. I love that there are no small pieces (like plastic eyes) and that they can be washed.
customer_reviews.author: lannegan

customer_reviews.title: my 21 month old grandson is having lots of fun with his puppet family
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are soft, cuddlie and encourage pretend play and the development of language skills. The only improvement would be mouths that move. However, at this point, my 21 month old grandson is having lots of fun with his puppet family!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie McBurney

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and good quality, got that for my baby birthday party as a favor for younger kid.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Tsang

customer_reviews.title: These puppets are adorable, and super soft
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are adorable, and super soft. Not too big and not too small. I bought three sets to give as a birthday gift and was really pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.author: C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cute characters, run small
customer_reviews.text: Cute characters but adults cannot use them to play. May be Difficult for 4 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: My Ama

customer_reviews.title: may have been good for a child
customer_reviews.text: The Farm Animals were very cute, however there wasn't much room for you hand or fingers, may have been good for a child, but not an adult. I purchased them to play with my great granddaughter teaching her the animals, she is too young to hold them herself.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Foster

customer_reviews.title: So Soft and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Even more adorable in person! And super duper soft! My 3 year old loved these, and they fit well on her hands. Will probably buy the other sets next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: stringofpearls11

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas give for a baby and was told he loved it when his big sister put them on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute puppets. Bought as a Christmas give for a baby and was told he loved it when his big sister put them on and played with him.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited- the order was prompt, and delivered in 2 days!! Exactly what I had hoped for!! Have bought other toys from Melissa & Doug. They have all been high-quality and unique!
customer_reviews.author: Hi Cat Ho Ho

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Hand Puppets
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute hand puppets, your thumb and pinkie fit in their arms to make their arms move. Do keep in mind that their mouths do not open and shut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grades for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these I would recommend them to any child under 10
customer_reviews.author: Melylinn

customer_reviews.title: Cute for price
customer_reviews.text: Fun but I wish the mouths moved. Fingers can go into arms but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: LakesideBoyMomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my niece at Easter time and she loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My four and six year old neighbors loved these puppets
customer_reviews.text: My four and six year old neighbors loved these puppets. An excellent way to teach young children to use their imagination.
customer_reviews.author: yellow warbler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these puppets.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, just the right size for small hands. A very nice set of puppets.
customer_reviews.author: L Harrington

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a friend with kids
customer_reviews.text: great gift for a friend with kids. They will think omg 4 puppets?? 1 is great but 4 thats excessive. well guess what, parents have 4 hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jae K.

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my grandson who is 2 &1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandson who is 2 &1/2. It turns out these are the exact same ones they have in his preschool. He just loves them and plays with them all the time. They fit his hand perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great for older sibling to entertain infant sibling
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdiness, but hard for adult or Children’s hands to maneuver. Look like they will hold up well to toddler’s use. Great for older child to entertain infant sibling in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute hand puppets for little hands! My hand can fit in them, but it’s not easy to move the animals around. I think they would be great for children’s hands.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: They are well made. Colors are nice. Just the right size for adult/child Play. Good price. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Slowinski

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great.
customer_reviews.text: They're OK, cute but small and not really much range of movement. My daughter was interested in them for a day before getting bored.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a two-year old
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for a 2 year old. So many gifts were for up to 18 month olds or for three years old and above. So I was thrilled to find something safe and fun for the two-year old toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Dari Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young children!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my 18 month old grandchildren LOVED these puppets - not onyl do they learn about animals in their play, their parents use them for discussing house rules and conflict resolution - and of course being Melissa and Doug they are beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hitch

customer_reviews.title: Near impossible for an adult to fit and move the head!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and my twins love them. However, it says it fits adult hands but it is almost impossible for me to move the head. In fact getting my small hand in there to move it causes strain. Way too much stuffing in the head!
customer_reviews.author: Dana L.

customer_reviews.title: fun puppets but a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the product in general, but I have difficulty fitting the puppet on my hand. They would fit a child's hand better.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Marple

customer_reviews.title: these are great.
customer_reviews.text: These hand puppets are soft and well constructed. The eyes are made out of hard plastic which could pop off. Other than that, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Magathy

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got them on sale. Well made. Great for teaching preschool!
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Never received any feedback but I thought they were really cool.
customer_reviews.text: Gave 'em as a gift to granddaughter. Never received any feedback but I thought they were really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Brutus. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: They got her hands perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them when she opened them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute but my hand does not fit in them ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute but my hand does not fit in them, I can still make them work though. My hands aren't big at all but my fingers are long, so just keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Zoo Friends Hand Puppets
product_meta.description:
Style:Zoo Friends Hand Puppets| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFour adorable hand puppets make up this family-friendly collection—an excellent play set to help kids and caregivers role-play together! Four simple glove puppets with an animal theme make it easy and so much fun to act out scenes, practice new vocabulary, and spend quality time playing together. It’s great for building motor skills and self-confidence, too! Made with brightly patterned, washable fabrics and built to last, these soft and sweet hand puppets are sure to be go-to toys for years to come. This Melissa & Doug puppet set offers multiple ways to enrich the pretend-play experience. Parents can ask kids to identify each animal and then replicate its sound. Kids can describe the colors, patterns, and other details of each animal. Parents can place one puppet on their hand and another on their child’s hand, using their puppet to ask the child’s puppet questions. The Melissa & Doug Zoo Friends Hand Puppets make an exceptional gift for kids ages 2 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Deluxe Puppet Theater to round out the pretend play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we’ll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

BRAND STORY
By Melissa & Doug

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: ENTERTAINING PUPPET SET: The Melissa & Doug Zoo Friends Hand Puppets set contains 4 soft hand puppets, including an elephant, giraffe, tiger, and monkey.
SOFT-STUFFED PLUSH MATERIAL: Our fuzzy hand-puppet set is made from soft-stuffed plush material that not only encourages cuddle time but is washable for easy cleanup.
SIZED FOR CHILDREN AND ADULTS: This hand-puppets set has been sized to fit children and most adults. Kids learn motor skills, hand-eye coordination, communication skills, self-confidence, and more.

GIFT FOR KIDS 2 TO 6: These puppets make an exceptional gift for kids ages 2 to 6. Add the Melissa & Doug Deluxe Puppet Theater to round out the pretend play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!
